about_the_game:
Story

Anon and Suzie are moving to Moonripple Lake!

In the wake of his cratering crypto-gained net-worth, Anon is selling their apartment and moving to rent a house, so he might stave off the inevitable. Having to get a job. A genius decision? We'll find out.

In Moonripple Lake, Suzie and Anon will make new friends, bring in old ones, stumble onto mysteries, and go on adventures.
Most importantly, they'll do all that while having lots of kinky sex!

Features


Free Roam
At certain points as you progress through the story, you'll be able to explore your surroundings, and the town of Moonripple.
You'll visit different locations and find hidden secrets.

Polaroids
They're fun, spicy, sexy renders that you find by exploring the game in free-roam.
There's a variety of polaroids and they all have different ways of getting to them.

Gallery
The gallery holds polaroids that you find while exploring the game in free-roam.
You can review them here, and check your progress on collecting them all.

Achievements
Go off the beaten path and get achievements, and more hidden polaroids to boot!

Make decisions
Make decisions that affect Anon and Suzie's experiences, and the story.
From small immediate results, to larger long lasting consequences!

content_descriptors.notes:
The game features a host of different sexual events.
Vaginal, Anal, Oral. There are themes of sharing partners, exhibitionism, teasing, cheating, prostitution, and corruption.
The scenes and discussions are explicit.
All sexual acts in the game are CONSENSUAL.

The following content is probable to be included in the future, but not currently present in the game:
Light BDSM, depictions of alcohol consumption, physical violence.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04 or later / SteamOS 3.0 or later
  • Processor: 1.8 GHz Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible graphics card
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04 or later / Latest SteamOS version
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Quad Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 compatible graphics card
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.10 (Yosemite) or later
  • Processor: 1.8 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible graphics card
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 10.15 (Catalina) or later
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Intel Core i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 compatible graphics card
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: Moonripple Lake

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 1.8 GHz Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0c compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Quad Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
